alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 9:53PM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Central St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake and North St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
